mapper.select: SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spSeq ,m.mmName ,m.mmEmail ,s.path FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq left join member m on m.mmSeq = g.member_mmSeq left join imginsert_ship s on s.pSeq = a.spSeq and s.sort = 1 WHERE 1=1
SELECT a.spSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spEatNy ,a.spRentalNy ,a.spRemain ,a.spPrice ,d.ptName ,d.ptAddress FROM ship a LEFT JOIN port d ON a.port_ptSeq = d.ptSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.spSeq = #{spSeq}

SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spSeq FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq WHERE 1=1 AND g.member_mmSeq = #{member_mmSeq} AND g.odReturnNy = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET odModDate = now() ,odReturnNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND odSeq = #{odSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.odModDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spSeq FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq WHERE 1=1 AND g.member_mmSeq = #{member_mmSeq} AND g.odReturnNy = 1
